docs.snippet: An Indian publishing group came under fire for including the Nazi leader in a book about 11 people who “devoted their lives for the betterment of their country and people.”

headline.print_headline: Book Praising Hitler Is Cut  From Website
headline.main: Book Listing Hitler as a ‘Great Leader’ Is Removed from Publisher’s Website

docs.snippet: Wild populations of cheetahs, leopards, jaguars, lions and tigers have fallen at alarming rates. We need to act fast.

headline.print_headline: We Can Stop the Poaching of Big Cats. Here’s How.
headline.main: We Can Stop the Poaching of Big Cats. Here’s How.

docs.snippet: Sunitha Krishnan has spent over two decades rescuing thousands of women and children, often risking her own life in the process.

headline.print_headline: An activist faces down sex traffickers
headline.main: An Indian Activist Faces Down Sex Traffickers

docs.snippet: Naveen Kumar, a member of a far-right Hindu group, was held in connection with the death of Ms. Lankesh, a critic of the government.

headline.print_headline: Suspect Held in Indian Journalist’s Death
headline.main: Suspect Detained in Killing of the Indian Journalist Gauri Lankesh

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump is deliberately undermining faith in the American press corps. Other countries are taking note.

headline.print_headline: Mr. Trump’s War on the Truth
headline.main: The True Damage of Trump’s ‘Fake News’

docs.snippet: Jujhar Khaira of the Oilers is nearing the end of his first full season in the N.H.L., where he is the only active player of Indian descent.

headline.print_headline: Nudging Diversity  Forward in the N.H.L.
headline.main: An Edmonton Oiler Nudges Diversity Forward in the N.H.L.

docs.snippet: Andy Richter photographed around the world to present a diverse look at an ancient practice.
Lalu Prasad Yadav was convicted of embezzling 37 million rupees to buy fictitious medicines and cattle fodder while he was chief minister of Bihar State from 1990 to 1997.

headline.print_headline: Powerful Indian Politician Gets 14-Year Prison Sentence for Embezzlement
headline.main: Powerful Indian Politician Gets 14-Year Prison Sentence for Embezzlement

docs.snippet: “Hippocratic,” a documentary about Dr. M.R. Rajagopal, who helps India’s dying, shows the desperate need for the same drugs maligned for causing overdoses.

headline.main: Palliative Care Film Challenges Stereotypes About Opioids

docs.snippet: Fighting has worsened between Pakistan and India in Kashmir, and the shelling of a home in the Indian-controlled portion left five people dead.

headline.main: Mortar Shell Kills 5 Members of a Family in Kashmir
